game.name: TS Marketplace: CSX Scenario Pack 03
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: CSX Scenario Pack 03, created by High Iron Simulations, features ten new and realistic career scenarios which bring heavy haul railroading to life as CSX totes massive coal trains as well as manifest freight across the scenic and rugged spine of the Alleghany Mountains.
game.shortDescriptionEn: CSX Scenario Pack 03, created by High Iron Simulations, features ten new and realistic career scenarios which bring heavy haul railroading to life as CSX totes massive coal trains as well as manifest freight across the scenic and rugged spine of the Alleghany Mountains.
